song_lyrics: Tum bin kaun sago Hari mero... °ṭek
Māt pitā juvati sut bāndhav, milake sab dukh det ghanero;
Bahut kāl bhaṭakyo merī bhavanme, sahyo kaṣhṭ pratideh anero... ° 1
Mo kapaṭīse kuchh na banī hai, bāhya grahekī lāj so hero;
Garbhavās tan trās bahuvidh, kaṣhṭ miṭāy diyo bahutero†... ° 2
Brahmānand kahat sukhsāgar, adham uddhārak nām tum kero;
Mai to put kaput bhayo puni, tum to pitā nij birud grahero... ° 3
title: Tum bin kaun sago Hari mero

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-40: Sadguru Brahmanand Swami

Category: Shri Harina Pad
